message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $12,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,000. Can you meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $7,000 is too low, I'm willing to come down to $10,000. I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations and provide significant value.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $10,000 is still a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $8,500?
